summary: In 1881, in Algeria, Michael Denning and Hector Servadac are fighting a duel when a comet brushing Earth takes the two men to the Moon where they discover a prehistoric civilization.
cast: Cesare Danova|Sean McClory|Joan Staley|Danielle De Metz|Gregg Martell|Gil Perkins|I. Stanford Jolley|Mike Lane|Roger Til|Mark Dempsey|Jerry Sunshine|Dolly Grey|Lon Chaney Jr.|Chester Hayes|Carole Landis|Victor Mature
title: Valley of the Dragons
